1256.quoteText:
Uber may assign these Terms without your consent to: (i) a subsidiary or affiliate.
(ii) an acquirer of Uber's equity, business or assets.
or (iii) a successor by merger.
1256.title: Uber can transfer the TOS to affiliates and successors without your consent

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
tosdr.tldr: Uber can transfer the TOS to affiliates and successors without your consent.

1460.quoteText:
you retain the right to request lower Charges from a Third Party Provider for services or goods received by you from such Third Party Provider at the time you receive such services or goods, and Charges you incur will be owed to the Third Party Provider.
Uber will respond accordingly to any request from a Third Party Provider to modify the Charges for a particular service or good
1460.title: You have the right to request lower Charges from Third Party Providers

tosdr.case: You have the right to request lower Charges from Third Party Providers
tosdr.tldr: "...you retain the right to request lower Charges from a Third Party Provider for services or goods received by you from such Third Party Provider at the time you receive such services or goods, and Charges you incur will be owed to the Third Party Provider. Uber will respond accordingly to any request from a Third Party Provider to modify the Charges for a particular service or good."

1463.quoteText: Uber may immediately terminate these Terms or any Services with respect to you, or generally cease offering or deny access to the Services or any portion thereof, at any time for any reason.
1463.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

1472.quoteText: Uber does not guarantee that the Services, or any portion thereof, will function on any particular hardware or devices. In addition, the Services may be subject to malfunctions and delays inherent in the use of the Internet and electronic communications.
1472.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  Uber does not guarantee that their Services will work with any particular hardware or devices, and states the disclaimer that their Services may be subject to malfunctions and delays inherent with the use of the Internet and electronic communications.

1580.title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies

tosdr.case: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
tosdr.tldr: Uber offers a wide variety of additional policies to show their position in certain social and political fields.
